snippet.title: Shelter Manager [PC] Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Shelter Manager is a post-apocalyptic city management sim where you recruit survivors, upgrade your bunker and protect humanity's remnants through three deadly apocalypses.


More details here: https://worthplaying.com/game/15701-shelter-manager/


Shelter Manager will be coming to Steam Early Access ( https://store.steampowered.com/app/1256830/Shelter_Manager/ ) soon.



Shelter Manager will be coming to PC (Steam) in 2022.

#ShelterManager  #videogames #WorthPlaying #WorthPlayingvideos
